title: Guided Meditation for Positive Energy, Relaxation, Peace 🌤
description:
🌤 Download the audio for this guided meditation → https://www.lavendaire.com/meditation-positive-energy/

Enjoy this 20 minute guided meditation for positive energy, relaxation and peace, with an emphasis on gratitude, visualization and positive affirmations. This is a good meditation for beginners and all levels. I had so much fun making this, editing the meditation music together and crafting a peaceful guided experience. Comment below what you think and if you'd like more of these! 

10 Day Meditation Challenge: https://bit.ly/33RtyIV

channelDescription:
Hi, I'm Aileen! Lavendaire is a channel about personal growth & lifestyle design, where I share knowledge and inspiration on creating your dream life. ✨

Here you'll find content on: self development, intentional living, self love, habits, healing, mindset, guided meditations, positive affirmations, & more.

Lavendaire is for the dreamers who believe. For those who are smart, curious, and conscious, with an open mind, a love for learning, and a deep desire to live a brilliant and vibrant life.

In short, Lavendaire is for the artist of life.

//  Life is an art. Make it your masterpiece.  //

comments: ✨ Ready to transform your life in 2025? ✨ The Artist of Life Workbook is your personal guide to setting goals, finding clarity, and creating the life you want. Start your journey here: https://lavendaire.com/workbook 🌟
I know that many people won't read this. But, I hope you're having a better day than yesterday. You've made it this far. Don't quit now. Keep pushing. God bless you!
The part, “I am strong, I am brave, and I am resilient” I started crying. Wow.

I was just sitting in my college dorm. Saw the sunset out my window and wanted to meditate on it. This is the first one that caught my eye. In this I didn’t close my eyes I just watched the sunset. This meditation made me so emotional. I didn’t think I’d live to see this day. But I did. All the bad days. They were worth it because SO MANY things in life. Are worth it. And I just sobbed happy tears for 15 minutes. It was so therapeutic. And wonderful. And I just. Thank you. Thank you so much.
Whoever comes across this message, may your heart radiate with all the colors that you are. You are a blessing to this earth. Believe in yourself 😊
